item.title: An International Political Economy Perspective
item.description: Strange, Susan. “An International Political Economy Perspective.” In Governments, Globalization, and International Business, John H. Dunning, editor. 132-145. Oxford: Oxford University Press, 1997. In this chapter Strange lays out her idea of what International Political Economy is, including a wide-ranging view of politics (not just the activities of politicians and governments) and a focus on structural power. This then leads her to discuss the problems that globalisation presents for governments, business and people.
